description.short: Enhances Healing and Damage Absorption effects
description.long: Enhances the healing potential and damage absorption of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Heal.Scale}%.

description.short: Enhances Healing and Damage Absorption effects and reduces Endurance Cost
description.long: Enhances the healing potential and damage absorption of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Heal.Scale}% and reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.

description.short: Reduces Endurance Cost and Recharge Time
description.long: Reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.

description.short: Enhances Healing and Damage Absorption effects and reduces Recharge Time
description.long: Enhances the healing potential and damage absorption of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Heal.Scale}% and reduces the recharge time by  {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.

description.short: Enhances Healing and Damage Absorption effects and reduces Recharge Time and Endurance Cost
description.long: Enhances the healing potential and damage absorption of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Heal.Scale}%, reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and recharge time by  {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%

UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  While slotted this enhancement has a chance every 5 seconds to give you an absorption barrier.  If your health is between 31% and 75%, this power has a 10% chance of triggering.  However, if your health is less than 31% there is a 100% chance of it triggering.  This effect can only trigger once every 90 seconds.
